settings.heading: The Science Behind Gumpaws
settings.paragraph_1: At GumPaws, we’re redefining pet supplements with science, care and innovation. Guided by veterinary expertise, our gummies deliver tailored, human-grade nutrition that’s as effective as it is enjoyable—making health care a treat, not a chore.

settings.title: Or Supports Dental Health in Every Bite
settings.subtitle: Let’s face it—keeping up with your dog’s dental care isn’t easy, but it’s essential. Our soft, chewable supplements are designed to clean teeth and support oral health with every bite.
settings.step_1_content: The specific density and texture of our gummies are designed for enhanced friction and chewiness.
settings.step_2_content: As gummies interact with your dog’s teeth, they aid in cleaning and plaque removal to support ongoing dental health.
settings.step_3_content: Active ingredients are absorbed through the gums and mouth, delivering benefits straight to the bloodstream.

settings.ingredient_description: Glucosamine Hydrochloride is a natural amino sugar that reduces joint pain for dogs. Glucosamine assists in joint lubrication, helps maintain healthy cartilage, and sustains connective tissue.
Methylsulfonylmethane (MSM) is a natural antioxidant that reduces inflammation, stiffness, and hip, joint, and muscle pain in dogs. MSM also provides additional protection against infection.
This is the description of the ingredient.

settings.title: The Formulation
settings.subtitle: Made with only 12 essential active ingredients.

settings.title: Step 1
settings.subtitle: Guided by Veterinary Expertise
settings.description: At GumPaws, our journey starts with expertise. We collaborate closely with veterinarians and experts in pet health to identify key areas where dogs benefit most from supplements. Together, we’ve crafted targeted formulas to deliver exactly what your dog needs.

settings.title: Step 2
settings.subtitle: Personalized Nutrition
settings.description: Your pup deserves care that’s effective and efficient. That’s why we developed three core supplements that address your dog’s health holistically. We specifically focus on tackling common issues dog owners deal with, whether it's easing tummy troubles, supporting active joints, or maintaining a sparkling smile—GumPaws delivers results where they matter most for a long and healthy life.

settings.title: Step 3
settings.subtitle: Human-Grade Quality Gummies
settings.description: GumPaws is the first gummy supplement made exclusively for dogs, but we want to make sure they’re the same quality their humans get. Produced in partnership with leading “gummiceutical” engineers, our products are crafted to human-grade standards using all-natural ingredients. Not only are they safe and packed with essential nutrients—they’re also designed to taste so good, your dog will think it’s a treat.

settings.title: Step 4
settings.subtitle: Tested for Safety, Proven for Satisfaction
settings.description:
We know you prioritize your dog’s health and safety over everything, and at GumPaws, we believe in transparency and trust. Every batch of GumPaws gummies undergoes rigorous testing to ensure quality, safety and effectiveness. The result? A treat that supports your dog’s well-being, giving you peace of mind and your pup the best care in the world.

Have questions?
Contact us at
hello@gumpaws.com!

settings.heading: Our Approach
settings.paragraph_1: From formulation to flavor, our science-backed products are crafted with precision to ensure the best for your best friend.

settings.content: We treat pet health like a science. Our products are crafted with precision, backed by a rigorous formulation process led by top veterinarians and even human doctors. We’re committed to bringing the same level of care and expertise you’d expect for yourself, to your beloved pets.
